jd: From: Mano, Vysystems mano@vysystems.com Reply to: mano@vysystems.com Hi All,This is MANO from VySystems regarding a Java with Kafka and MongoDB ​with our client.PFB the job details and respond ASAP with the following details along with your updated resume and Required details mentioned below.· Are you comfortable with this job/role?· Your current location:· Work authorization status:· Expected hourly rate:· Availability to start:Role : Java with Kafka and MongoDBLocation: Dallas, TX Job Description:5+ years of overall experience in software engineering2+ years of experience in Java, J2EE programming, Kafka, Spring Framework and design techniques and web applications/REST APIsHands on with version control practices, Continuous Integration tools e.g. JenkinsKnowledge of cloud technologies – AWS, GoogleUnderstanding of relational databases e.g. Oracle, MS Sql ServerExposure to Agile based software development• Following MongoDB specific capabilities:Designing and customizing MongoDB applicationsImplementing database updates and migrationDebugging and troubleshooting when issues ariseAnalyzing databases and advising on optimizing performanceUnderstanding of back-up and disaster recovery plansGood to have knowledge of big data platforms e.g. Cassandra, Hadoop, Marklogic etc.
